name: Watching OpenAI unravel in real-time (Changelog News #71)
summary: The internet watches OpenAI unravel in real-time, tldraw has a new experiment going with GPT-4 Vision that turns mockups into code, Tony Ennis makes the case for HTML First, James Somers writes a “eulogy” to coding for The New Yorker &amp; Laurence Tratt describes and details four kinds of optimisation.
